name: Light Cycle (Mewaki)
description:
Light Cycle is a game about exploration through endless days and nights. Turning on lights to discover new paths. As a fairy its your responsibility to maintain the cycle and keep the other fairies safe from darkness.

During the night you run around trying to turn all lights on before daytime comes.

During the day, you try to collect more light to recharge your wand in preparation for the night. New paths will open, and find the dark fairy that has been sucking the light out of the trees during the night.
